reviews.Title: Worst experience ever!
reviews.Comment:
Used the phone for over a month now.
Too slow to handle evwn daily tasks, beleive I do not play games at all, only daily tasks.
Hangs a lot, even freezes like brick sometimes and than you are stuck for almost 15mins to half hour, before it restarts automatically.
Do not waste money on deaign or brand name. I nought it for 6 years OS update but I am sure will either sell it or stop using it within 6 more days.
